posts.author: Female
posts.title: Thank You Jesus 😊 Christ. Glad, Grateful, Blessed.

posts.raw_content:
We are a community who looks evil in the face and will stare down every comment that tries to tell us we are hateful for seeing its true form.  Call it what you want, but we have been called to confront the kingdoms of man in our hearts.  The more we have sought the truth, the more we are awakened that this is a unique condition among the masses.


The way of the world is a side ditch that needs a tow truck for recovery.  The wheels of the mechanism move clearly when Project Veritas ousts their founder.  When referendum does not create reform because of the holy filibuster.  When elections are stolen from a democracy, and it becomes illegal to discuss it.


The origin of the Pharisees was a circumstance of Babylonian exile when the worship of God had become tainted through the influx of apostasy of the world.  The Pharisees sought to bring back the traditions of the Torah against the Hellenization of the world.  Their vision was fulfilled in an ironic way by their rejection of the incarnation of God in order to highlight the contrast.


2,000 years later and the world does not see it.  It’s easy to miss with all of the distraction.  What percentage of my taxes went to children being trafficked around the world?  How many atrocities did I take part in just by doing my job?


God knows the heart of man, and yet He still sent His son to take part in our human experience.  He knows the kingdoms that we operate and was offered to be lord over all of them in the wilderness.  He knew that He would be glorified in a lowly birth and lowly death.  His message was so great that both were inevitable.


Today we recognize the birth of our Savior and carry on with his work with renewed rhythms.  The one and only God-man came to Earth to start a ministry that shook the governments that try to control it.
posts.author: OnceADroplet
posts.title: Merry Christmas Pedes 🎅
posts.content:
We are a community who looks evil in the face and will stare down every comment that tries to tell us we are hateful for seeing its true form. Call it what you want, but we have been called to confront the kingdoms of man in our hearts. The more we have sought the truth, the more we are awakened that this is a unique condition among the masses.

The way of the world is a side ditch that needs a tow truck for recovery. The wheels of the mechanism move clearly when Project Veritas ousts their founder. When referendum does not create reform because of the holy filibuster. When elections are stolen from a democracy, and it becomes illegal to discuss it.

The origin of the Pharisees was a circumstance of Babylonian exile when the worship of God had become tainted through the influx of apostasy of the world. The Pharisees sought to bring back the traditions of the Torah against the Hellenization of the world. Their vision was fulfilled in an ironic way by their rejection of the incarnation of God in order to highlight the contrast.

2,000 years later and the world does not see it. It’s easy to miss with all of the distraction. What percentage of my taxes went to children being trafficked around the world? How many atrocities did I take part in just by doing my job?

God knows the heart of man, and yet He still sent His son to take part in our human experience. He knows the kingdoms that we operate and was offered to be lord over all of them in the wilderness. He knew that He would be glorified in a lowly birth and lowly death. His message was so great that both were inevitable.

Today we recognize the birth of our Savior and carry on with his work with renewed rhythms. The one and only God-man came to Earth to start a ministry that shook the governments that try to control it.
